QuestData.Title: Light's Return
QuestData.Description: Xe'ra has been saved! We have won an important victory here.$b$bThe Light Mother should be back on the Vindicaar. No doubt she will want to speak with you. There is so much to explain...$b$bRomuul should be able to teleport us back to the ship now. Let me know when you are ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Turalyon to return to the Vindicaar.
QuestData.RewardText: The Army endures. The Light Mother's prophecy will be fulfilled.$b$bAll is as it was meant to be.
